### 0039 : Other Effective Area-Based Conservation Measures {-}

<!-- -------------------------------------------------- -->
**Description** : This dataset contains area-based management measures that constitute 'other effective area-based conservation measures' ('other measures') according to DFO's Operational Guidance for Identifying ‘Other Effective Area-Based Conservation Measures’ in Canada’s Marine Environment.
